name: Aritzia Location Audit
command:
{
    [select loc.stoloc,
            loc.locsts,
            loc.wh_id
       from locmst loc
      inner
       join loc_typ typ
         on loc.loc_typ_id = typ.loc_typ_id
      where loc.locsts = 'I'
        and typ.fwiflg = 1
        and (typ.sigflg = 1 or typ.stoare_flg = 1 or loc.stoloc in ('PNDCONV-GIFT', 'PNDCONV-PACK', 'PNDMONO-PREP', 'PNDSHIP-01', 'PNDTRLR-CA', 'PNDTRLR-US'))] catch(-1403)
    |
    if (@? = 0)
    {
        reset location status
         where stoloc = @stoloc
           and wh_id = @wh_id catch(@?)
        |
        if (@? = 0)
        {
            {
                [select loc.arecod,
                        count(*)
                   from locmst loc
                  inner
                   join loc_typ lt
                     on loc.loc_typ_id = lt.loc_typ_id
                  where lt.fwiflg = 1
                  group by loc.arecod]
                |
                write output file
                 where filnam = 'locaud_error.log'
                   and data = sysdate || ',' || @arecod || ',' || '========================START========================'
                   and newline = 'Y'
                   and mode = 'A'
                   and path = '$LESDIR/log'
                |
                [/*#nolimit*/
                 select loc.stoloc,
                        loc.wh_id
                   from locmst loc
                  inner
                   join loc_typ lt
                     on loc.loc_typ_id = lt.loc_typ_id
                  where lt.fwiflg = 1
                    and loc.arecod = @arecod]
                |
                validate location
                 where stoloc = @stoloc
                   and wh_id = @wh_id catch(@?)
                |
                if (@action is not null and @action != 'UNKNOWN')
                {
                    execute server command
                     where cmd = @action catch(@?)
                    |
                    if (@? <> 0)
                    {
                        write output file
                         where filnam = 'locaud_error.log'
                           and data = sysdate || ',' || @stoloc || ',' || 'Location Audit Action Failed'
                           and newline = 'Y'
                           and mode = 'A'
                           and path = '$LESDIR/log'
                    }
                    |
                    commit
                }
            }>>res
            |
            write output file
             where filnam = 'LOCSTS_RESET.log'
               and data = sysdate || ',' || @stoloc || ',' || @locsts || ',' || 'Location successfully reset'
               and newline = 'Y'
               and mode = 'A'
               and path = '$LESDIR/log'
        }
        else
        {
            write output file
             where filnam = 'LOCSTS_RESET.log'
               and data = sysdate || ',' || @stoloc || ',' || @locsts || ',' || 'Location reset failed'
               and newline = 'Y'
               and mode = 'A'
               and path = '$LESDIR/log'
        }
    }
};
commit;
